title: Scanner
description: Checks a directory for changes, and performs file managment operations accordingly.

source.description: The directory where files will be scanned from, and have actions performed on them.

scan.description: If true, the source directory will continually be scanned for changes.

interval.description: If scan is true, the interval that the source directory will be scanned at. (in seconds)

pattern.description: Regular expression to match filename with action.

action.description: File operation that will be performed on the file. Can be copy, rename, move, delete.

destination.description: The new destination directory of the file. (applicable to copy and move)
